rukus.text: 15|80|Ara abasya'i hijarabasira [1] rasulera prati mithya aropa karechila
15|81|amara taderake amadera nidarsana diyechilama, kintu tara ta upeksa karechila.
15|82|Ara tara pahara kete ghara nirmana karato nirapade.
15|83|Atahpara bhore bikata citkara taderake pakara'o karala.
15|84|Kaje'i tara ya arjana karata ta tadera kona kaje aseni [1].
15|85|Ara asamana, yamina o tadera majhe abasthita kono kichu'i yatharthata chara srsti karini [1] ebam niscaya kiyamata asabe'i. Kaje'i apani parama saujan'yera sathe oderake ksama karuna [2].
15|86|Niscaya apanara raba, tini'i mahasrasta, mahajnani [1].
15|87|Ara amara to apanake diyechi punah punah pathita satati ayata o mahana kura'ana [1].

15|88|Amara tadera bibhinna srenike bhoga- bilasera ye upakarana diyechi tara prati apani kakhano apanara ducokha prasarita karabena na [1]. Tadera jan'ya apani duhkha karabena na [2]; apani muminadera jan'ya apanara bahu nata karuna
15|89|ebam baluna, ‘niscaya ami'i prakasya satarkakari.’
15|90|Yebhabe amara nayila karechilama bibhaktakaridera upara [1]
15|91|yara kura'anake bibhinnabhabe bibhakta kareche [1].
15|92|Kaje'i sapatha apanara rabera! Abasya'i amara tadera saba'ike prasna karaba'i
15|93|se bisaye, ya tara amala karata.
15|94|Ata'eba apani ye bisaye adesaprapta hayechena ta prakasye pracara karuna ebam musarikadera theke mukha phiriye nina.
15|95|Niscaya amara bidrupakaridera birud'dhe apanara jan'ya yathesta [1]
15|96|yara allah‌ra sathe an'ya ilaha nirdharana kare. Kaje'i sighra'i tara janate parabe.
15|97|Ara abasya'i amara jani, tara ya bale tate apanara antara sankucita haya
15|98|kaje'i apani apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam apani sajadakaridera antarbhukta hona [1]
15|99|Ara apanara mrtyu asa paryanta apani apanara rabera ibadata karuna [1].
